product_name: Teva Clifton Creek Herringbone Shoes - Men's
long_description: Teva Clifton Creek Herringbone slip-on shoes offer casual style and all-day comfort for padding around, whether in town or at the lodge. Supple leather and cotton canvas uppers exude style and offer resilient performance; elastic gores supply slip-on convenience and comfort. Polyester mesh linings work to wick moisture away from feet. Removable Mush EVA insoles act as the midsoles and deliver plenty of cushioning underfoot. Rubber outsoles on the Teva Clifton Creek Herringbone slip-on shoes are designed to supply long-lasting traction for everyday wear.
short_description: Teva Clifton Creek Herringbone slip-on shoes offer casual style and all-day comfort for padding around, whether in town or at the lodge.
